q1: What does the mortgage calculator include?
a1: Home price, down payment (amount or percentage), annual interest rate, loan term (15/20/25/30 years), and annual property tax rate.
a2: Yes, you can enter your annual property tax rate and it will be included in the monthly payment breakdown.
q3: How is the down payment calculated?
a3: You can enter either a dollar amount or a percentage of the home price. Changing one automatically updates the other.
a4: Yes. All calculations are performed locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server or stored anywhere.
a5: You can choose 15, 20, 25, or 30-year terms to compare monthly payments.
